content: right now we have {{site.data.fhir.igName}} or {{site.data.fhir.ig.name}] for the IG Title. It seems that in my footers "{{site.data.fhir.igName}} Version" has been changed to ''DEQM"or "VHD" instead of the full title. I think we should define another site variable for a short name in addition to the title and in the IG resource as well.
